Pedro-Revez-Silva/shelfarr

Request and management system for ebooks and audiobooks

View on index · View in 3D Map

Related repos

  • Self-hosted manager for book collections
  • Converts ebooks to audiobooks with chapters, metadata, multilingual TTS, voice cloning
  • turn books into audiobooks with one command
  • Web interface for audiobook library management and file merging
  • BookLore: self-hosted app for organizing, reading, and tracking books and ebooks
  • open source platform for tracking and managing assets with QR codes, reservations, and team collaboration
  • Player for DRM-free audiobooks
  • Accounting software for small businesses
  • Searches MyAnonamouse and imports audiobooks to Audiobookshelf
